name: Edit / un-publish creations
description: Allow owners to edit a creation's title/description after publishing, and optionally un-publish.

name: BUG: Creation Failure
description: sometimes a creation fails or results in a stuck image loading forever - this looks bad

name: Admin User CRUD
description: ability for admin to modify users

name: Invite credits
description: Grant starter credits on invite acceptance; record inviter and source.

name: Provider boosts
description: Server-scoped boosts increase provider credit yield with caps, no discovery lift.

name: Invites & redemption
description: Optional invite onboarding via email or shareable token, with stored invite context.
